product_name: Soleus Pulse Rhythm Heart Rate Monitor Watch - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Get in the zone during your training runs. The Pulse Rhythm watch delivers your heart rate without a pesky chest strap, and it's easy to recharge with a built-in USB port.
short_description: Get in the zone during your training runs. The Pulse Rhythm watch delivers your heart rate without a pesky chest strap, and it's easy to recharge with a built-in USB port.
